attributes.action: Reduce the cost of non-alcoholic equivalent drinks in pubs
attributes.additional_details: With people trying to be healthier, and the Government wanting a healthier nation, it does not seem fair that the hospitality industry are profiting as much from this.
attributes.background: Introduce a law to make the hospitality industry reduce the cost of non-alcoholic equivalent drinks, for example non-alcoholic beer.  You often find that non-alcoholic equivalent drinks are often the same price if not more than the alcoholic version.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653581
